member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE
member.summary: Contains a set of flags that indicate the current Shell settings. This structure is used with the function.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fShowAllObjects
member.summary: Nonzero if the Show All Files option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fShowExtensions
member.summary: Nonzero if the Hide extensions for known file types option is disabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fNoConfirmRecycle
member.summary: Nonzero if the Display Delete Confirmation Dialog box in the Recycle Bin is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fShowSysFiles
member.summary: Nonzero if the Don't show hidden files, folders, or drives option is selected, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fShowCompColor
member.summary: Nonzero if the Display encrypted or compressed NTFS files in color option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fDoubleClickInWebView
member.summary: Nonzero if the Double-Click to Open an Item option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fDesktopHTML
member.summary: Nonzero if the Active Desktop – View as Web Page option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fWin95Classic
member.summary: Nonzero if the Classic Style option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fDontPrettyPath
member.summary: Nonzero if the Allow All Uppercase Names option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

summary.para: Nonzero if the Show File Attributes in Detail View option is enabled, or zero otherwise.
Windows Vista and later. Not used.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fMapNetDrvBtn
member.summary: Nonzero if the Show Map Network Drive Button in Toolbar option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fShowInfoTip
member.summary: Nonzero if the Show Info Tips for Items in Folders & Desktop option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fHideIcons
member.summary: Nonzero if the Show Desktop Icons option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fAutoCheckSelect
member.summary: Windows Vista and later: Nonzero if the Use checkboxes to select items option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fIconsOnly
member.summary: Windows Vista and later: Nonzero if the Always show icons, never thumbnails option is enabled, or zero otherwise.

member.name: SHELLFLAGSTATE.fRestFlags
member.summary: For Windows Vista this bitfield is 1, otherwise member this is not used.
